{"id":1003431289,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"4 hours, 15 minutes","timestamp":1690278455,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"143 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1003431289/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"18.9 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def maxAreaOfIsland(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:\n        max_area = 0 \n\n        ROWS = len(grid)\n        COLS = len(grid[0])\n        curr_area = 0\n\n        visited = [[False for _ in range(COLS)] for _ in range(ROWS)]\n\n        def dfs(r, c):\n            if not (0<=r<ROWS) or not (0<=c<COLS):\n                return\n\n            if visited[r][c]:\n                return\n\n            if grid[r][c]==0:\n                return\n            \n            visited[r][c] = True\n            nonlocal curr_area\n            curr_area+=1  \n\n            dfs(r+1, c)\n            dfs(r-1,c)\n            dfs(r,c+1)\n            dfs(r,c-1)\n\n\n        for r in range(ROWS):\n            for c in range(COLS):\n                if not visited[r][c] and grid[r][c]==1:\n                    curr_area = 0\n                    dfs(r,c)\n                    max_area = max(max_area, curr_area)\n\n\n        return max_area\n            \n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false}
